Note: The original Latin appears in the Kalendar of Shepherds; and a prose translation in St John’s College Camb. 37, f. 55v.
_description: The punishments of the adulterer — five couplets

EDU27.First Lines:
for owtyn dowte al awowtereSal thole sum payne þat folouse
                    here…
EDU27.Last Lines:
…Or of sum membre thole cynselthrucis maledy or wonde
                    cruel
EDU27.Editions:
Borland,  Katherine R. 
             A Descriptive Catalogue of the Western Medieval Manuscripts in
                Edinburgh University Library
         Edinburgh: University Press, 1916: 332.
